                                        int pos)
        Parameters:
        in - the String in which a line is searched
        pos - the position that is found in the searched line
        Returns:

      • isWord

        public static boolean isWord(java.lang.String in,
                             java.lang.String query,
                             int pos)
        Returns:
        true if the characters before and/or after the 'query' String is not a letter or a number

      • indLastBlockStart

        public static int indLastBlockStart(java.lang.String in,
                                    int pos,
                                    java.lang.String blockStart,
                                    java.lang.String blockEnd)
        Returns:
        the index of the block comment start before the specifies position. returns -1 if a block end is found behind a block start

      • indNextBlockEnd

        public static int indNextBlockEnd(java.lang.String in,
                                  int pos,
                                  java.lang.String blockStart,
                                  java.lang.String blockEnd)
        Returns:
        the index of the block comment end. -1 if there is no block end or if the block end is located before a block start

      • isInQuotes

        public static boolean isInQuotes(java.lang.String in,
                                 int pos)
        Returns:
        true if the symbol right before 'pos' is a quotes symbol
